name: La Digue Passage: White Birds on Wind
description:
6 terns, 1 buoy, 3 beacons. Blink rate spells a number.

Riddle: "A thought repeated becomes a path."

Sophisticated painterly artwork using etched-parchment technique with Seychellois cultural motifs. Part of "The Siren's Map of Praslin" cipher series.

attributes.value: VII - The Siren's Map of Praslin

advanced_specs.render_prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of 6 terns, 1 buoy, 3 beacons. Blink rate spells a number.. channel_passage_navigation_rhythm with wind_swept_feather_beacon_light_texture. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. background_passage_midground_buoy_foreground_terns. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: tern_flight_patterns, maritime_navigation. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
advanced_specs.negative_prompt: flat shapes, primitive graphics, basic fills, simple geometry, vector primitives, plain colors, childlike, cartoon, modern technology, photoreal, neon, low detail

puzzle_data.scene: 6 terns, 1 buoy, 3 beacons. Blink rate spells a number.
puzzle_data.riddle: A thought repeated becomes a path.
